caption.p: Normalized distributions of flood heights. Distributions are for the modern (1970â€“2005) and future eras for flood heights calculated using the RCP4.5 and RCP8.5 SLR projections ( 21) and for flood heights calculated by combining enhanced AIS contributions ( 26) with the RCP4.5 and RCP8.5 SLR projections ( 21). Results are shown for future scenarios for ( A) the MPI model, ( B) the CCSM4 model, ( C) the IPSL model, and ( D) the IPSL model to 2300.
